original_text:
So he said he would destroy them—
    had not Moses, his chosen one,
stood in the breach before him
    to keep his wrath from destroying them.
korean_text: 그러므로 여호와께서 그들을 멸하리라 하셨으나 그가 택하신 모세가 그 어려움 가운데에서 그의 앞에 서서 그의 노를 돌이켜 멸하시지 아니하게 하였도다

sentences.original_text: So he said he would destroy them
had not Moses, his chosen one
stood in the breach before him
to keep his wrath from destroying them
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 진노가 그들을 멸망시키는 것을 막기 위해
